column1: Table 1. Total U.S. Resident Population by Age, Sex, and Series:    April 1, 2020 (In thousands)
Notes: Estimates may not sum to totals shown because of rounding. Year of birth refers to events occurring between April 1 and March 31 of the indicated years.
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Division, 2020 Demographic Analysis (December 2020 release).
